ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BEI - Il-kostruzzjoni mill-ġdid ta’ stazzjon sekondarju

OLD.P: All tenders must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Tender for Reconstruction of SS 330 kV “Brovarska” with AT-3 installation” not later than 11:00 Kyiv time on 20.4.2018 at the following address:
State enterprise NPC “Ukrenergo”, 25 Symona Petliury str., 01032 Kyiv, Ukraine.
